channel.title: Help please! server only works for me
channel.description:
only i can go on the server and for sum reason it says starting kittyscape on 0.0.0.0 i need it to run on royalpkscape.no-ip.org
and i portforwarded (even tho i got modem) and still only i can join??? help...
ONLY I CAN JOIN I THINK... AND CANT ADD TO SITES , CONNECTION CANT BE ESTABLISHED..!!!
help me please....
(using vengance server...)

item.title: Help please! server only works for me

kittyscape is the name of my server…=\

item.title: Help please! server only works for me
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Re-port forward. It says starting KittyScape server, because that is the name that is in your client.java. It means it’s running the server, not that your server ip isn’t running.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please! server only works for me
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

when it says starting “kittyscape” on “0.0.0.0” that means your server is running now. and people can (or should be able to) join entering the name u specified. u can choose to type in the server name you chose into the server ip on the client you use or u can put 0.0.0.0 but ppl should be able to join
